summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Friday 17 December to end of Friday 17 December GMT
description: Friday will be another grey, cloudy day, but most places should stay dry. Remaining mild for the time of year, but becoming breezy in the afternoon.<br/><br/>Local build up of pollutants should be prevented by the 'clean' Atlantic breeze.<br/><br/>Air pollution is largely expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide <br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
